description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26170ST.OO.1000ST.08 has a stainless steel case and matching bracelet. It features a black 'Mega Tapisserie' dial with Arabic numerals.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26170 Chronograph Black Themes

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 25721TI.OO.1000TI.05 features a titanium case and matching bracelet. The dial is silver.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25721 Chronograph Titanium / Silver

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 26237ST.OO.1000ST.01 was introduced in 2017 in celebration of the 25th anniversary of the Offshore series. It closely follows the design of the original 25721.ST.O.1000ST.01, although crown and pushers are now done in ceramic instead of rubber.

Edit January 2018 - it appears the pushers are no longer ceramic, but rather rubber-coated.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26237 Stainless Steel / Blue / Bracelet / 25th Anniversary

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore 26411PO.OO.A002CR.01 is a limited edition of 20 pieces introduced in 2018. It features a platinum case with black ceramic bezel, push pieces and screw-locked crown. The dial is black with blue accents.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 44 Platinum / Ceramic / Black / Rubber

description:
he Royal Oak Offshore Rubberclad reference 25940SK.OO.D002CA.03 has a stainless steel case with a rubber-clad bezel, crown and pushers.

The .03 signifies the version with black date disc.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 25940 Chronograph Rubberclad Stainless Steel / Black / Black Date

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Team Alinghi was introduced in 2007 in honor of the Alinghi sailing team, which at the time was sponsored by Audemars Piguet. It was one of the first watches to make extensive use of forged carbon for the the case, especially with the 26062FS.

Reference 26062.FS.OO.A002.CA.01 has a forged carbon mid case and bezel. The caseback is made of titanium and is engraved with an image of the Team Alinghi crew in action.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26062 Team Alinghi Forged Carbon

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Pride of Argentina in pink gold was introduced in 2010 as a limited edition of 50 pieces, commemorating 200 years of independence for Argentina. The colors of the Argentinian flag are echoed in the case.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26365 Pride of Argentina Pink Gold

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26185TI.GG.D002CA.01 is a limited edition of 50 pieces created for Parisian Audemars Piguet dealer Chronopassion. It features a micro-blasted titanium case and a dark grey dial. The caseback is engraved with 'Limited Edition Chronopassion'.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26185 Chronopassion

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26131OR.OO.D002CR.01 is a limited edition of 50 pieces created in honor of the 2007 Queen Elizabeth II Cup. It features a pink gold case and a black dial with diamond-set hour markers.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26131 Queen Elizabeth II Cup 2007

description: The Royal Oak OffShore 25995 was introduced in 2003 as a limited edition of 1000 pieces in honor of the Alinghi sailing team. The case and bracelet are titanium, while the octagonal bezel is made of platinum.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25995 Alinghi Commemorative

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 25770ST.0.D009XX.07 was introduced in 1997 as part of a series based on colorful prototypes that were a surprise hit with customers. The case measures 42mm across and both dial and strap are turquoise.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25770 Chronograph Turqoise

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore 26470IO.OO.A006CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2018. It features a titanium case paired with a slate grey dial with silver subdials. The pushers and crown are done in grey ceramic.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 42 Titanium / Grey / Rubber

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26405CE.OO.A030CA.01 was introduced in 2020. This Offshore has a black ceramic case with blue ceramic bezel, pushpieces and screw-locked crown, and titanium pushpiece guards. The dial is blue.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 44 Ceramic / Blue

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. 950 platinum case, blue dial,
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26401 Ceramic / Platinum

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Legacy was introduced in 2011 as a limited edition of 1500 pieces. It features a 48mm ceramic case with titanium pushpiece guards and pink gold pushers. The titanium caseback is engraved with “Royal Oak Offshore Arnold Schwarzenegger The Legacy Limited Edition”
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26378 Legacy

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Barrichello III was introduced in 2008 as the third Offshore collection inspired by the F1-driver.

The reference 26284RO.OO.D002CR.01 sports a case in pink gold, titanium and ceramic. The dial has a white tachymeter ring, a red inner ring and a skeletonized center.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26284 Barrichello III Pink Gold

description: The Oak Offshore 26197ST is a limited edition of 101 pieces created for the Taipei Audemars Piguet boutique - located in the famous Taipei 101 tower. The numeral 10 is replaced by a diamond-set 101.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26197 Taipei 101

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26078PO.OO.D018CR.01 is part the second run of watches AP designed in association with Rubens Barrichello. The case is made in a combination of platinum and high-tech ceramics, with smaller details done in titanium.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26078 Barrichello II Platinum

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26078IO.OO.D001VS.01 is a limited edition of 1000 pieces created in 2006 by Audemars Piguet in association with Rubens Barrichello.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26078 Barrichello II Titanium

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 25854TI.OO.1150TI.01 was introduced in 2003 as one of the first Offshore models to feature a perpetual calendar. The case is made of titanium.

Picture by Antiquorum.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25854 Perpetual Calendar Titanium / Silver

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak 25808ST.O.0009/01 Full Calendar was introduced in 1996. It features a stainless steel case and a blue dial; it is fitted with a matching strap.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25808 Full Calendar Blue

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak 25808BA.O.0009/01 Full Calendar was introduced in 1996. It features a yellow gold case and a blue dial; it is fitted with a matching strap.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25808 Full Calendar Yellow Gold / Blue

description: The Royal Oak Offshore reference 25721ST.OO.1000ST.08 has a stainless steel case and a matching bracelet. The black dial features AP's signature 'Méga Tapisserie' pattern and bold Arabic numerals.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25721 Chronograph Stainless Steel / Black

description: The Royal Oak 26471SR.OO.D101CR.01 is a limited edition of 300 pieces introduced in 2016. It features a stainless steel case and 18-carat pink gold bezel, hands and links, while the crown and pushers are done in black ceramic. The blue dial has AP's signature 'Méga Tapisserie' pattern and black subdials. The watch is delivered with an additional blue rubber strap.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26471 Stainless Steel / Pink Gold / Bucherer Blue Editions

description: The Royal Oak Offshore reference 26470SO.OO.A002CA.01 was introduced in 2018. It features a stainless steel case with ceramic bezel, pushers and crown. Both strap and dial are black with red accents.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 42 Stainless Steel / Ceramic / Black / Rubber

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26236OR.YY.D085CA.01 was introduced in 2019. It features a pink gold case, a matching smoked pink gold dial, and a rainbow-set bezel.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26231 Lady Chronograph Pink Gold / Silver / Rainbow

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. Black ceramic case, glareproofed sapphire crystal and caseback, black ceramic bezel, screw-locked crown and pushpieces, titanium links
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26402 Ceramic / Titanium

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. Safari model. Stainless steel case, white dial, brown strap.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Safari

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Diver Chronograph is aquatic-themed variation of AP's popular sports watch. It was introduced at SIHH 2016 in four variations, all boutique exclusive limited editions featuring bold colors on their dials and matching rubber straps.

Reference 26703ST.OO.A051CA.01 has a yellow dial with black accents.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Chronograph Yellow

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Gstaad Classic 26296IK was introduced in 2009. It features a sand-blasted titanium case and a rubber-clad bezel. The upper pusher is done in read.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26296 Gstaad Classic 2009

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26198TI.OO.D101CR.01 is a limited edition created in 2009 for the Hong Kong market; its name is a reference to the first road of Hong Kong - it was built between 1841 and 1843. This ROO has a titanium case and a black dial with red accents.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26198 Queens Road

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Las Vegas Strip was introduced in 2009 in honor of Las Vegas. It features a black-coated stainless steel case and a black dial with red details.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26186 Las Vegas Strip

description: The Royal Oak OffShore Rhone Fusterie was introduced in 2008 in honor of the reopening of the Geneva Audemars Piguet boutique, located at Place de la Fustery. It features a stainless steel case and a color scheme inspired by the Swiss flag.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26108 Rhone Fusterie

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26088ST.OO.D002CR.01 is a limited edition of 25 pieces created for Amsterdam Diamond Center.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26088 Amsterdam Diamond Center

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Alinghi Polaris was introduced in 2005 in honor of AP's sponsoring of the Alinghi sailing team. It features the self-winding caliber AP 2326 with module 2847, which featured both a flyback chronograph as well as a regatta countdown timer. This movement is exclusive to this watch.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26040 Alinghi Polaris

description: One of the original Royal Oak Offshore models, the reference 25721.ST.O.1000ST.01 features a stainless steel case and matching integrated bracelet. The dial is blue.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25721 Chronograph Stainless Steel / Blue

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 15130BC.ZZ.8042BC.01 is a heavy diamond-set version of AP's iconic sports watch. Its case and bracelet are set with a total of 474 baguette-cut diamonds for a total of 47.20 carat. The dial is set with an additional 116 baguette-cut diamonds (7.32 carat).
name: Royal Oak OffShore 15130 Full Baguette

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore 26470ST.OO.A028CR.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017. It features a stainless steel case and a black-blue dial. It is fitted with a blue hornback alligator strap.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26470 Stainless Steel / Black / Alligator

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Diver Chronograph is aquatic-themed variation of AP's popular sports watch. It was introduced at SIHH 2016 in four variations, all boutique exclusive limited editions featuring bold colors on their dials and matching rubber straps.

Reference 26703ST.OO.A038CA.01 has a green dial with black accents.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Chronograph Green

description: The Royal Oak 26540OR.OO.A010CA.01 was introduced in 2016. It is powered by caliber 2897, which pairs a tourbillon escapement and a chronograph complication - a combination that's very emblematic for Audemars Piguet. The rose gold case measures 44mm across and features a white ceramic screw-down crown and matching pushers.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Peripheral Red Gold / White

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore T3 reference 26215.BC.ZZ.A101CR.01 was introduced in 2013. It features the T3 style case with the pushpiece-protectors executed in diamond-set white gold.

Case, bezel and buckle; 276 brilliant-cut diamonds; ~7.28 carats
Dial; 332 diamonds; ~0.92 carats
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26215 T3 White Gold / Diamond

description: The Royal Oak Offshore T3 was introduced at BaselWorld 2003 in celebration the launch of the T[erminator]3 movie. The titanium case measures 48mm across and features distinct protects covering its crown and pushers. The T3 was originally available with either a charcoal or silver dial; both came in a special box including the Terminator 1 & 2 movies and a coupon for the T3 dvd.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25863 T3 Titanium / Grey

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Pride of Argentina in titanium gold was introduced in 2010 as a limited edition of 100 pieces, commemorating 200 years of independence for Argentina. The colors of the Argentinian flag are echoed in the case.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26365 Pride of Argentina Titanium

description:
Introduced in 2011, the Royal Oak Offshoreis a limited edition created for Marcus Watches, Audemars Piguet Authorized Dealer in London. 

Reference 26299SN.OO.D001CA.01 features a DLC coated stainless steel case with white Arabic numerals, tachymeter and hands. The crown and pushers are done in white as well.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26299 Marcus White

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Perpetual Calendar 26262 is a limited edition of 25 pieces created for the Sicilian Audemars Piguet AD Restivo. It features a pink gold case with rubber-clad bezel.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26262 Perpetual Calendar Restivo

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Pride of Russia Pink Gold was introduced in 2005 was a limited edition of 50 pieces created for the Russian market. The caseback is engraved with the Russian eagle.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26061 Pride of Russia White Gold

description: The Royal Oak Offshore JPM was introduced in 2004 in honor of Juan Pablo Montoya, who at the time was an ambassador of AP. It was designed in collaboration with Richard and the watches -available in pink gold, platinum or titanium- feature carbon fiber details throughout.  The movement has an open-worked oscillating weight inspired by disc brakes of Formula 1 cars.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26030 Juan Pablo Montoya Pink Gold

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Diver reference 15706AU.OO.A002CA.99 was created in 2012 for the Spanish national football team, in honor of their Euro Cup win.
name: Royal Oak OffShore Diver 15706 Spain European Champion

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Scuba 15340OR was introduced in November of 2005 for Audemars Piguet Authorized Dealer Wempe. It features a pink gold case and a black dial.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 15340 Scuba Wempe Pink Gold

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Diver ref. 15710ST.OO.A010CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017 as part of a series of 5 watches with vibrant color schemes, inspired by the 2016 Offshore Diver Chronographs with similar bold looks.

Reference 15710ST.OO.A010CA.01 has a white dial and matching strap. Both dial and case are highlighted by blue accents.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Stainless Steel / White

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore 26401RO.OO.A002CA.02 was introduced at SIHH 2017. It features a pink gold case with black ceramic bezel, pushes and crown. The black dial sports the signature 'Méga Tapisserie' pattern and pink gold applied markers.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 42 Pink Gold / Ceramic / Black / Rubber

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding 26540ST.OO.A027CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017. It sports a stainless steel case, a blue dial, blue rubber-clad pushers and crown, and a blue rubber strap. It is powered by Audemars Piguet's high-end caliber 2897, a chronograph movement with tourbillon escapement and peripheral winding system, offering an unobstructed view at the movement from the back.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding Stainless Steel / Blue

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding 26540ST.OO.A038CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017. It sports a stainless steel case, a bright green dial, green rubber-clad pushers and crown, and a green rubber strap. It is powered by Audemars Piguet's high-end caliber 2897, a chronograph movement with tourbillon escapement and peripheral winding system, offering an unobstructed view at the movement from the back.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding Stainless Steel / Green

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore 26400SO.OO.A335CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2019. It features a stainless steel case with blue ceramic bezel, push pieces and crown, plus a matching blue dial. It is fitted with a camouflage rubber strap, while an additional plain blue rubber strap is included.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 44 Stainless Steel / Ceramic / Marine / Rubber

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore ref. 26470OR.OO.1000OR.03 has a pink gold case and a black dial. It is fitted with a pink gold bracelet.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26470 Pink Gold / Black / Bracelet

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. 950 Platinum Case and Cermet Bezel. Limited edition of 100 pieces.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26568 Schumacher Platinum

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. 18-carat Pink Gold Case and Cermet Bezel. Limited edition of 500 pieces.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26568 Schumacher Pink Gold

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. Titanium Case and Cermet Bezel. Limited edition of 1000 pieces.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26568 Schumacher Titanium

description: The elegance of the new Pride timepiece is presented through the octagonal sporty case while its white colour sets the tone for the chronograph. Blending a stainless steel case with a white ceramic bezel, the Royal Oak Offshore displays a silver dial with “Grande Tapisserie” pattern.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26172 Pride of Siam

description: A watch with two “faces”, an encounter between contrasts or a watchmaking union of opposites, the Royal Oak Offshore Selfwinding Tourbillon Chronograph is an amazing blend of two worlds. Limited Edition of 50.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Forged Carbon

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26298SK.OO.D101CR.01 is a limited edition of 250 pieces created in 2010 for the New York Audemars Piguet Boutique. It features a stainless steel case and a rubber-clad bezel.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26298 57th Street

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 'BumbleBee' was introduced in 2009. It features a forged carbon case with a ceramic bezel. The black dial features bright yellow details, earning it its nickname 'BumbleBee'.

26176FO.OO.D101CR.02 has luminova whereas the 26176FO.OO.D101CR.01 does not.  The 26176FO.OO.D101CR.03 has a titanium back; on the other references it is stainless steel.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26176 BumbleBee

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26086ST.OO.D002CR.01 is a limited edition of 100 pieces created in honor of the 20th anniversary of East Coast Jewelry. It features lime-yellow accents on its dial and strap. A stainless steel bracelet was also included. 'Worth Avenue' is an upscale shopping disctrict in Palm Beach (Florida) and home to one of East Coast Jewelry's locations.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26086 Worth Avenue

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26082TK.OO.D002CA.01 is a limited edition of 100 pieces introduced in 2007 in honor of the opening of the Singapore AP boutique. It features a case in tantalum with a rubber-clad bezel. The anthracite 'mega tapisserie' dial features a red 8 for good fortune.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26082 Orchard Road

description: The Offshore Alinghi 26074ST.OO.D002CA.01 is a special version of the 26040ST.OO.D002CA.01 created for those involved with the Alinghi team.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26074 Alinghi Polaris Team Watch

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Rubens Barrichello is a 2005 limited edition of 150 pieces. The titanium case features a rubber-clad bezel. The black dial sports accents in the colors of the Brazilian flag and Arabic 5' markers.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26071 Rubens Barrichello

description: The Royal Oak 26007BA.OO.D088CR.01 was introduced in 2003 as a limited edition of 400 pieces created in honor of AP-fan Arnold Schwarzenegger. It features a yellow gold case and a rich brown dial.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26007 Arnold Schwarzenegger

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26283 is a smaller-sized, ladies version of the Royal Oak Offshore sports watch. The case measures 37mm across and is done in stainless steel, while the crown and pushers are rubber-clad. The dial features AP's 'Mega Tapisserie' pattern and over-sized Arabic numerals.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26283 Lady Chronograph White

description:
Introduced in 2011, the Royal Oak Offshoreis a limited edition created for Marcus Watches, Audemars Piguet Authorized Dealer in London. 

Reference 26299SN.OO.D001CA.01 features a DLC coated stainless steel case with red Arabic numerals, tachymeter and hands. The crown and pushers are done in red as well.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26299 Marcus Black

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Diver ref. 15710ST.OO.A038CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017 as part of a series of 5 watches with vibrant color schemes, inspired by the 2016 Offshore Diver Chronographs with similar bold looks.

Reference 15710ST.OO.A038CA.01 has a green dial with blue accents. The rubber strap is green, while the rubber-clad crowns are done in blue.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Stainless Steel / Green

description: The Royal Oak Offshore reference 26405CE.OO.A002CA.02 was introduced in 2017. This watch has a black ceramic case with titanium case back and crown / pushpiece guards. It is powered by the self-winding caliber AP 3126 / 3840. The black dial is highlighted by pink gold markers and hands.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26405 Chronograph Ceramic / Titanium / Black

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding 26540ST.OO.A070CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017. It sports a stainless steel case, a bright orange dial, orange rubber-clad pushers and crown, and an orange rubber strap. It is powered by Audemars Piguet's high-end caliber 2897, a chronograph movement with tourbillon escapement and peripheral winding system, offering an unobstructed view at the movement from the back.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding Stainless Steel / Orange

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 26408OR.OO.A010CA.01 is a limited edition of 500 pieces created in celebration of the summer of 2017. For the occasion, the pink gold case is paired with a white dial and matching rubber strap. 

This watch was initially introduced as a s a limited edition of 500 pieces created in celebration of the 50th anniversary of the Byblos hotel and its Les Caves du Roy night club in Saint-Tropez with a print with Le Byblos' coat of arms is found on the sapphire crystal case back.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26408 Pink Gold / Summer Edition

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Diver reference 15710ST.OO.A052CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2018. It features a stainless steel case and a khaki green dial. It is fitted with a rubber strap matching the dial color.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Stainless Steel / Khaki

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Diver reference 15710ST.OO.A077CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2018. It features a stainless steel case and a purple dial. It is fitted with a rubber strap matching the dial color.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Stainless Steel / Purple

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore 26400SO.OO.A054CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2018. It features a stainless steel case with green ceramic bezel, push pieces and crown. The dial is beige. It is fitted with a camouflage rubber strap, while an additional khaki rubber strap is included.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 44 Stainless Steel / Ceramic / Beige / Rubber

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 25721ST.OO.1000ST.01 is the original offshore model as designed by Emmanuel Gueit and introduced at BaselWorld 1993. It features a stainless steel case and matching bracelet, paired with a blue dial.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25721 Chronograph Stainless Steel / Blue

description: The Royal Oak Offshore reference 26067BC.ZZ.D002CR.01 has its white gold case and dial set with a total of 341 brilliant-cut diamonds, ~5.86 carats. While a non diamond-set Royal Oak Offshore typically has a water resistance of 100 meters, it is down to 20 meters for this version.
name: Royal Oak Offshore White Gold / Diamonds

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Survivor is a limited edition of 1000 pieces introduced in 2008. It features an elaborate, black titanium case, a black ceramic bezel and a rather unusual set of pushpiece guards - resulting in a high-tech and aggressive look.
name: Royal Oak 26165 Offshore Survivor

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore T3 reference 26215.BC.ZZ.1239BC.01 was introduced in 2013. It features the T3 style case with the pushpiece-protectors executed in diamond-set white gold.

Case, bezel and bracelet; 673 brilliant-cut diamonds; ~15.10 carats
Dial; 332 diamonds; ~0.92 carats
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26215 T3 White Gold / Diamond / Bracelet

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore reference 26402CE.OO.A002CA.02 was introduced in 2014. This watch has a black ceramic case with titanium case back and crown / pushpiece guards. It is powered by the self-winding caliber AP 3126 / 3840.

This watch was never commercially available; it was replaced by the 2015 ref. 26405CE.OO.A002CA.01.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26402 Prototype

description: The reference 26286RO.OO.D002CR.01 is a piece unique created for Rubens Barrichello, in honor of his record of 257 F1 races.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26286 Barrichello III 257

description: The Royal Oak 26218ST.OO.1000ST.01 is a limited edition of 20 pieces created in honor of the 20th anniversary of the Royal Oak. It closely resembles the original 1993 model.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26218 20th Anniversary 1993-2013

description:
To raise money for the 2011 Japan earthquake, Audemars Piguet created two limited edition Offshore 'Ginza7' watches, with parts of the proceedings benefiting the Japanese Red Cross.

Reference 26205AU.OO.D002CR.01 has a forged carbon mid case with a ceramic bezel and titanium case back. The dial is black, lacking the typical tapisserie pattern. The 7 is diamond-set.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26205 Ginza7 Forged Carbon

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26182ST.OO.D018CR.01 was introduced in 2008 as a limited edition of 300 pieces in honor of cricket player and Audemars Piguet ambassador Sachin Tendulkar.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26182 Sachin Tendulkar 10

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 'Rue St. Honoré' was introduced in 2007 as a limited edition of 100 pieces in honor of the opening of the Paris Audemars Piguet boutique. Its colors are inspired by the French flag.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26181 Rue St-Honoré

description:
To raise money for the 2011 Japan earthquake, Audemars Piguet created two limited edition Offshore 'Ginza7' watches, with parts of the proceedings benefiting the Japanese Red Cross.

Reference 26180ST.OO.D101CR.01 has a stainless steel case and a black 'Mega Tapisserie' dial with diamond-set numeral 7.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26180 Ginza7 Stainless Steel

description: The Royal Oak Jalan Bukit Bintang was introduced in 2007 as a limited edition of 100 pieces in honor of the AP boutique in the Singapore Jalan Bukit Bintang. The case is titanium; it is one of the few (only?) Offshores with PVD-coated screws.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26115 Jalan Bukit Bintang 'Kill Bill'

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 25940OK.O.D002CA.01 has a pink gold case and a rubber-clad bezel. The dial is anthracite with black subdials. The .01 has the white date disc; this was changed in 2011 to a black one.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25940 Chronograph Rubberclad Pink Gold

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26234SR.ZZ.D202CR.01 is a limited edition of 300 pieces created for Audemars Piguet retailer Bucherer. It features a case in stainless steel & pink gold with a diamond-set bezel. The silver-toned dial features a 'Lady Tapisserie' pattern and blue subdials.
name: Royal Oak OffShore Lady 26234 Two Tone Bucherer

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Diver ref. 15710ST.OO.A051CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017 as part of a series of 5 watches with vibrant color schemes, inspired by the 2016 Offshore Diver Chronographs with similar bold looks.

Reference 15710ST.OO.A051CA.01 has a yellow dial with blue accents. The rubber strap is yellow, while the rubber-clad crowns are done in blue.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Stainless Steel / Yellow

description:
The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak 25808st.OO.D009/02 Full Calendar was introduced in 1996. It features a stainless steel case and an brown dial; it is fitted with a matching strap.

Picture by user.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25808 Full Calendar Brown

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26405CE.OO.A056CA.01 was introduced in 2020. This Offshore has a black ceramic case with green ceramic bezel, pushpieces and screw-locked crown, and titanium pushpiece guards. The dial is green.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 44 Ceramic / Green

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display. 18-carat white gold case, entirely set with baguette-cut diamonds. 18-carat white gold dial. 18-carat white gold bracelet, entirely set with baguette-cut diamonds. 484 baguette-cut diamonds ; ~48.98 carats (case, bracelet). 88 baguette-cut diamonds ; ~4.80 carats (dial). 60 baguette-cut diamonds ; ~1.89 carats (inner bezel).
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26473 Full Baguette

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26159OR.OO.A801CR.01 is a special edition of the limited edition 26158OR.OO.A801CR.01, featuring the Govenor's Seal on the caseback. They were mostly / exclusively sold at charity auctions.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26159 Arnold's All-Stars Governor's Seal

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Shaquille O'Neal was introduced in 2007 in celebration of Audemars Piguet's partnership with the NBA player. It was available in two variations: one white gold with diamond-set bezel, and another one in stainless steel. Both versions feature a black 'Mega Tapisserie' dial, with switched positions for numbers 2 and 3. The closed caseback has an engraved image of Mr. O'neal.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26133 Shaquille O'Neal Stainless Steel

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Team Alinghi was introduced in 2007 in honor of the Alinghi sailing team, which at the time was sponsored by Audemars Piguet. It was one of the first watches to make extensive use of forged carbon for the the case, especially with the 26062FS.

Reference 26062PT.O.A002CA.01 has a platinum mid case paired with a forged carbon bezel. The crown and pushers are made of ceramics.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26062 Team Alinghi Platinum

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26364ST.OO.D003CU.01 is a limited edition of 40 pieces created for the National Classic Tour 2010 race. It is identical to the Tour Auto of the same year except for its caseback, which features a reference to the race.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26364 The National Classic Tour 2010

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore Pride of Mexico was created in honor of 200 years of independence. It features a case in titanium with a stainless steel bezel. Both dial and strap have details in the colors of the Mexican flag. 

The CO reference is as indicated in the 'Go Offshore' pages of Audemars Piguet's website.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26297 Pride of Mexico Steel / Titanium

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Grand Prix was introduced in 2010 as a collection of three limited edition watches. Done in either titanium, pink gold or platinum, all of them feature ornate forged carbon details - most notably on the titanium version.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26290 Grand Prix Platinum

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Grand Prix was introduced in 2010 as a collection of three limited edition watches. Done in either titanium, pink gold or platinum, all of them feature ornate forged carbon details - most notably on the titanium version.
name: Royal Oak Off Shore 26290 Grand Prix Titanium

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 'BumbleBee' was introduced in 2009. It features a forged carbon case with a ceramic bezel. The black dial features bright yellow details, earning it its nickname 'BumbleBee'. The first series had ceramic plots for the strap attachment.

26176FO.OO.D101CR.01 & 26176FO.OO.D101CR.02 have stainless steel, pvd-coated backs. 26176FO.OO.D101CR.03 has a titanium back.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26176 BumbleBee

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26170ST.OO.D101CR.03 features a stainless steel case and a black hornback alligator strap. The black dial has the signature 'Grand Tapisserie' pattern and bold Arabic numerals.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26170 Chronograph Black Themes / Strap

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26078RO.OO.D001CR.01 is part the second run of watches AP designed in association with Rubens Barrichello. The case is made in a combination of pink gold and high-tech ceramics, with smaller details done in titanium.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26078 Barrichello II Pink Gold

description: The Royal Oak Offshore reference 25940SK.OO.D002CA.02 has a stainless steel case and a rubber-clad bezel. The white dial features a 'mega tapisserie' pattern and Arabic numerals.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25940 Chronograph Rubberclad Stainless Steel / Silver

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Scuba was introduced in 2005 at the request of Wempe. The present 'Boutique' edition is part of the second generation, which was available exclusively at Audemars Piguet Boutiques and available in blue, red and orange.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 15701 Scuba Boutique Red

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26048OK.ZZ.D010CA.01 features a pink gold case of 37mm with a rubber-clad, diamond-set bezel. The dial features diamond-set markers.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26048 Lady Chronograph Pink Gold / White

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 26231 is a smaller-sized Offshore Chronograph with diamond-set bezel. The case measures 37mm, housing the self-winding caliber 2385 movement. The dial features the signature 'Tapisserie' pattern in 'Lady' version.

Reference 26231ST.ZZ.D010CA.01 is a boutique-only edition. It features a silver dial with blue subdials.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26231 Lady Chronograph Stainless Steel / Silver / Diamond

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 26231 is a smaller-sized Offshore Chronograph with diamond-set bezel. The case measures 37mm, housing the self-winding caliber 2385 movement. The dial features the signature 'Tapisserie' pattern in 'Lady' version.

Reference 26231ST.ZZ.D069CA.01 was added to the collection in 2018. It features a deep pink dial and matching rubber strap.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26231 Lady Chronograph Stainless Steel / Pink / Diamond

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore 26401RO.OO.A087CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2019. It features a pink gold case with brown ceramic bezel, push pieces and crown, plus a matching brown dial. It is fitted with a camouflage rubber strap, while an additional brown rubber strap is included.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 42 Pink Gold / Ceramic / Brown / Rubber

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Grande Complication ref. 26571OR.OO.A002CA.01 features a pink gold case and an open-worked dial with black tracks for the various indications. Inside ticks the 'Grande Complication' calibre 2885 with perpetual calendar, split-seconds chronograph and minute repeater.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26571 Grande Complication Pink Gold / Black

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. Forged carbon case, black dial, black strap.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26400 Ceramic / Forged Carbon

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. Volcano model. Stainless steel case, black dial, black strap
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26170 Chronograph Volcano

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. Stainless steel case, silvered dial, stainless steel bracelet.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26170 Chronograph Panda

description: Perpetual calendar, chronograph, hours, minutes, small seconds. Iconic Royal Oak Offshore case in 950 platinum . Blue dial with “Grande Tapisserie” pattern, blue counters, white gold applied hour-markers and Royal Oak hands with luminescent coating, blue inner bezel ring. 10-piece limited edition.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Perpetual Calendar Platinum

description:
Audemars Piguet is no stranger to Grande Complications - even the iconic Royal Oak received such movements. But 2013 marked the introduction of the first Royal Oak Offshore with grande complication movement, in the process perhaps creating the first sports watch with such a caliber.

The model presented here has a titanium case and a smoked sapphire dial.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26571 Grande Complication Titanium / Ceramic

description: The Royal Oak Offshore reference 26067BA.ZZ.D088CR.01 has its yellow gold case and dial set with a total of 341 brilliant-cut diamonds, ~5.86 carats. The water resistance is down to 20 meters.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Yellow Gold / Diamonds

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Grande Complication reference 26571.OR.OO.A002.CA.01 was introduced in 2015. It features a pink gold case (44mm) with a ceramic crown and pushers.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26571 Grande Complication Pink Gold

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Grande Complication reference 26570IO.GG.A010CA.01 was introduced in 2013. It features a titanium case with blasted finish and a black ceramic bezel.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26570 Grande Complication Titanium / Ceramic

description:
The reference 25863ST.OO.A001CU.01 is a prototype of the Royal Oak Offshore T3. Unlike the final production model, this version features screws that are raised slightly above the bezel.

One of a select number that made it into production was auctioned during the December 2, 2003 Time to Give Afghanistan auction in Beverly Hills. Of this specific watch the caseback was engraved with the signature of Arnold Schwarzenegger.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25863 T3 Prototype

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore reference 26405CE.OO.A002CA.01 was introduced in 2015. This watch has a black ceramic case with titanium case back and crown / pushpiece guards. It is powered by the self-winding caliber AP 3126 / 3840.

Reference 26402CE.OO.A002CA.01 is similar but with a black dial.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26405 Chronograph Ceramic / Titanium / Anthracite

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26214ST.OO.1150ST.01 is a piece unique perpetual calendar in stainless steel created 'Pour Rocco', delivered in combination with a special AP Tradition watch, in a fitted box.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26214 Perpetual Calendar Piece Unique

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26200SN was introduced in 2009 for Audemars Piguet Authorized Dealer The Hour Glass. It features a stainless steel case with black PVD-coating and a black dial with bold orange accents. 99 pieces were made, excluding the 10 pieces created for the boardmembers of The Hour Glass.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26200 The Hour Glass Lava
caseGlass: Royal Oak OffShore 26200 The Hour Glass Lava

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Pride of Indonesia was introduced in 2015. It features a titanium case paired with a pink gold solid caseback, the latter engraved with the Indonesian Garuda. The dial lacks the traditional Tapisserie pattern.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Pride of Indonesia

description: The Royal Oak Gentleman's Driver was introduced in 2010. This Offshore is an hommage to the world of motorsports, with various details being inspired by racing cars and equipment. A notable feature is the chiselled bezel, highlighting the hexagonal screws.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26175 Chronograph Gentleman's Driver

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Pride of Russia Pink Gold was introduced in 2005 was a limited edition of 200 pieces created for the Russian market. The caseback is engraved with the Russian eagle.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26061 Pride of Russia Pink Gold

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 25770ST.O.0009XX.04 was introduced in 1997 as part of a series based on colorful prototypes that were a surprise hit with customers. The case measures 42mm across and both dial and strap are bright red.

The picture is from the original 1997 AP website; please share if you have better images!
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25770 Chronograph Red

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 25721TI.OO.1000TI.03 has a titanium case and matching bracelet. The silver dial features blue subdials and a blue tachymeter ring.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25721 Chronograph Titanium / Silver / Blue

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 15704PR.OO.D002CA.01 is a 5-piece limited edition created in 2009. Based on the Royal Oak Offshore Scuba, the case is done in platinum and pink gold; the dial is green. The watch was dedicated to the Milan Audemars PIguet Boutique.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 15704 Scuba Montenapoleone

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Lady 26048SK.ZZ.D010CA.01 was introduced in 2010. It features a stainless steel case with a white rubber-clad & diamond-set bezel.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26048 Lady Chronograph Stainless Steel / White

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding 26540ST.OO.A051CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017. It sports a stainless steel case, a bright yellow dial, yellow rubber-clad pushers and crown, and a yellow rubber strap. It is powered by Audemars Piguet's high-end caliber 2897, a chronograph movement with tourbillon escapement and peripheral winding system, offering an unobstructed view at the movement from the back.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Selfwinding Stainless Steel / Yellow

description: The Royal Oak Offshore reference 26144ST.ZZ.D010CA.01 was introduced in 2018 as a limited "summer' edition of 200 pieces. It features a stainless steel case with diamond-set bezel, and a silver dial with "Lady Tapisserie" pattern.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26144 Lady Chronograph Stainless Steel / Silver / Diamond / Summer Edition 2017

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26231OR.ZZ.D003CA.01 was introduced in 2018. It features a pink gold case with diamond-set bezel and a silver dial with grey subdials. It is fitted with a grey rubber strap.

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Diver reference 15710ST.OO.A032CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2018. It features a stainless steel case and a turquoise dial. It is fitted with a rubber strap matching the dial color.

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Diver reference 15710ST.OO.A085CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2018. It features a stainless steel case and a "beige means business" dial. It is fitted with a rubber strap matching the dial color.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Diver Stainless Steel / Beige

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26470PT.OO.1000PT.02 is a limited edition of 25 pieces introduced in 2018. It features a smoked blue dial with black subdials. Both case and bracelet are done in platinum, while the pushers and crown are executed in black ceramic.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 42 Platinum / Smoked Blue / Bracelet

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26470ST.OO.A030CA.01 was introduced in 2018. It features a bright blue dial and matching ceramics on the pushers and crown.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 42 Stainless Steel / Indigo / Rubber

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26582CB.OO.A010CA.01 was introduced in 2018. It features a white ceramic case paired with an openworked dial. It is powered by caliber 2885, which features a minute repeater, split-seconds chronograph, perpetual calendar, moonphase, and hours, minutes & small seconds.
name: Royal Oak OffShore Grande Complication White Ceramic

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26474TI.OO.1000TI.01 was introduced in 2018 as a limited edition of 200 pieces celebrating the Queen Elisabeth Cup horse race.It features a titanium case and bracelet, which are paired with a grey dial with blue subdials.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 42 Chronograph Titanium / Grey / Bracelet / QE II Cup

description:

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26405NR.OO.A002CA.01 was introduced in 2020. This Offshore has a black ceramic case with 18-carat pink gold bezel and pushpiece guards, and black ceramic pushpieces and screw-locked crown. The dial is grey.

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display. 18-carat white gold case, entirely set with baguette-cut diamonds. 18-carat white gold dial. description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. It was available in two variations: one white gold with diamond-set bezel, and another one in stainless steel. Both versions feature a black 'Mega Tapisserie' dial, with switched positions for numbers 2 and 3. The closed caseback has an engraved image of Mr. O'neal.

The Royal Oak Offshore Ladycat was introduced in 2013 in honor of Audemars Piguet in sponsoring the magnificent Décision 35 Ladycat (SUI10) catamaran & its team. The black and green colorway is inspired by the catamaran's colors.

The stainless steel version is limited to 150 pieces. The white gold model was made in just 10 examples.

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph 26407TI.GG.A002CA.01 was introduced at SIHH 2017. For ref. 26407TI.GG.A002CA.01, this hand-wound movement is housed in a sandblasted titanium case measuring in at 44mm. The crown and pushers are made of ceramics; the strap is rubber.

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock.Limited Edition of 600. name: Royal Oak Offshore Lebron James

description: Selfwinding chronograph with date display and small seconds at 12 o'clock. Titanium case, anthracite dial, titanium bracelet
name: Royal Oak Offshore 26170 Chronograph Titanium

description: This sophisticated chronograph with its incisive design features a wealth of opulent detailing. Blue dial, openworked at 6, 9 and 12 o’clock, silver-toned counter, Arabic numerals and white gold Royal Oak hands with luminescent coating.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Platinum

description:
Audemars Piguet is no stranger to Grande Complications - even the iconic Royal Oak received such movements. But 2013 marked the introduction of the first Royal Oak Offshore with grande complication movement, in the process perhaps creating the first sports watch with such a caliber.

The model presented here has a titanium case and a smoked sapphire dial. It is fitted with a white rubber strap.

The titanium case measures 48mm across and features distinct protects covering its crown and pushers. The T3 was originally available with either a charcoal or silver dial; both came in a special box including the Terminator 1 & 2 movies and a coupon for the T3 dvd.

name: Royal Oak OffShore 26278 Tour Auto 2009

description: The Royal Oak 26217 was introduced in 2014 (2013?) as a limited edition available in 3 different case materials - stainless steel, white gold and pink gold. All feature a dial with bold orange accents, earning it its nickname 'Goliath'.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26217 US Boutique White Gold

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26195ST is a limited edition of 200 pieces created in 2009 in collaboration with Japanese kickboxer Masato Kobayashi (魔裟斗). It features a stainless steel case. description:
The Royal Oak Offshore 26231 is a smaller-sized Offshore Chronograph with diamond-set bezel. The case measures 37mm, housing the self-winding caliber 2385 movement. The dial features the signature 'Tapisserie' pattern in 'Lady' version.

Reference 26231ST.ZZ.D038CA.01 was added to the collection in 2018. It features a stainless steel case with diamond set bezel and an acid green dial. It is only available at AP boutiques.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26231 Lady Chronograph Stainless Steel / Green / Diamond

description:
The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26470OR.OO.A125CR.01  was introduced in 2018. It features a pink gold case and an alligator strap. The dial is ruthenium grey with ivory subdials.

Reference 26470OR.OO.1000OR.02 is similar though fitted with a pink gold bracelet.
name: Royal Oak Offshore 42 Pink Gold / Grey / Alligator

description: The Audemars Piquet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26236OR.SS.D010CA.01 is a limited edition of 10 pieces created for Bartorelli jewelers. It features a pink gold case and a silver dial. The bezel is set wt
name: Royal Oak OffShore Lady Chronograph Pink Gold / Silver / Bartorelli

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore reference 26231BA.ZZ.D027CA.01 was introduced in 2019 as a boutique-exclusive limited edition of 100 pieces. It features a Yellow gold case with diamond-set bezel and a Blue dial . It is fitted with a grey rubber strap.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26231 Lady Chronograph Yellow Gold / Blue / Diamond

description: This limited edition watch is a collector’s piece. But not for the sort of collector who keeps his watches behind glass. This watch has been designed for challenges and fresh horizons. It is destined for the wrist of a man who accepts no limits but those he sets for himself.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Titanium

description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore ref. 26288OF.OO.D002CR.01 has a pink gold case (44.00mm) crowned by a forged carbon bezel. Inside ticks the hand-wound caliber AP 2933.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Tourbillon Chronograph Pink Gold

description: Perpetual calendar with chronograph, hours, minutes and small seconds in the iconic Royal Oak Offshore case in 18-carat pink gold. Black dial with “Grande Tapisserie” pattern, black counters, pink gold applied hour-markers and Royal Oak hands with luminescent coating, black inner bezel ring"Grande Tapisserie" pattern, black counters, pink gold applied hour-markers and Royal Oak hands with luminescent coating, black inner bezel ring. 25-piece limited edition.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Perpetual Calendar Pink Gold

description: Perpetual calendar, chronograph, hours, minutes, small seconds. Titanium case. Black dial with “Grande Tapisserie” pattern, black counters, white gold applied hour-markers and Royal Oak hands with luminescent coating, black inner bezel ring. 35-piece limited edition.
name: Royal Oak Offshore Perpetual Calendar Titanium

description: The Royal Oak Offshore Grande Complication reference 26571.IO.OO.A002.CA.01 was introduced in 2012 as a limited edition of 3 pieces. It features a titanium case paired with a ceramic bezel, pushers and crown. The dial is made of smoked sapphire, revealing the inner workings of the self-winding 'grande complication' caliber 2885.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26571 Grande Complication Titanium

description:
The Royal Oak Offshore T3 reference 26215.OR.ZZ.A801CR.01 was introduced in 2015. It features the T3 style case with the pushpiece-protectors executed in diamond-set pink gold.

Case, bezel and buckle; 276 brilliant-cut diamonds; ~7.28 carats
Dial; 332 diamonds; ~0.92 carats
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26215 T3 Pink Gold / Diamond

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26387IO.OO.D010CA.01 was introduced in 2015. It features a titanium case paired with a white ceramic bezel, crown and pushpieces. The silver-toned dial is openworked to reveal parts of its hand-wound caliber 2933.
name: Royal Oak OffShore Tourbillon Chronograph White Ceramic

description: The Royal Oak 26217 was introduced in 2014 (2013?) as a limited edition available in 3 different case materials - stainless steel, white gold and pink gold. All feature a dial with bold orange accents, earning it its nickname 'Goliath'.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26217 US Boutique Stainless Steel

description: Hour Glass 'Lava' Offshore for the board members of The Hour Glass.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26201 Lava Hour Glass Board Members
caseGlass: Royal Oak OffShore 26201 Lava Hour Glass Board Members

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26196BC is a limited edition of 20 pieces created in 2009 in collaboration with Japanese kickboxer Masato Kobayashi (魔裟斗). It features a white gold, diamond-set case. The black/red dial is inspired by his fighting colors. At 1:00 the dial features a diamond-set three, which is said to be Mr. Masato's lucky number. The 14 found at 2:00 is that of his wife.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26196 Masato Diamond Set

description: The Royal Oak OffShore 26191 is a limited edition of 60 pieces created in the spirit of the Las Vegas Strip. It features a diamond-set white gold case and a black dial with bold red numerals.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26191 Las Vegas Strip Diamond Set

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 26170ST.OO.1000ST.09 has a stainless steel case and a matching bracelet. The dial is blue and features bold Arabic numerals.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 26170 Chronograph Blue Themes

description: The Royal Oak Offshore 25862SC.ZS.1000ST.02 was introduced in 1998 and was the first Offshore to feature a diamond-set bezel - OEM.
name: Royal Oak OffShore 25862 Chronograph
